item.title: Language learning | dictate NCE II
item.description: Last week, I went to the theatre, i had a very good set, the play is very interesting. i did not enjoy it. the young man and a young woman is sitting behind me. They were talking loudly. i got very angry. i could not heat the actors. i turned around, i looked at the man and the woman angrily, they did not pay any attention, in the end, i could not bared, i turned around again,i can’t hear the word, i said angrily. Its not your business, the young man said rudely, this is a private conversation.
